Others: Kawhi Leonard made his season debut against the Atlanta Hawks on Sunday night, tallying 12 points in 19 minutes.
The Clippers snapped a two-game losing streak in Leonard’s return, improving to 20-15 on the season.
Ty Lue told reporters after the game that Leonard’s return will be treated like the preseason as he ramps up after his long absence.
Leonard's minutes restriction seems to be around 20 right now.
Speaking on the broadcast after the game, Leonard made a statement that went viral.
Leonard also spoke postgame about returning to a Clippers team that has been playing well in his absence.
The Clippers will now head on the road for a two-game road trip against the Minnesota Timberwolves and Denver Nuggets.
